title: Gluten-free bread for bread machines
ingredients: ['3 eggs', '1 tablespoon cider vinegar', '60ml olive oil', '60ml honey', '350ml buttermilk, at room temperature', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 tablespoon xanthan gum', '5 tablespoons cornflour', '8 tablespoons potato starch', '8 tablespoons soy flour', '320g white rice flour', '1 tablespoon dried active baking yeast']
